source.dea92629:
This dataset provides the 2 files you need to load fastai:
- fastai2 version 2.0.13
- fastcore version 1.0.13

### Step 1: 
In your kernel click on the Add data tab on the right top of the notebook.

![data.PNG](attachment:data.PNG)
source.243410c2: You can now load all fastai dependencies with the internet off.
source.8ada4a0d:
### Step 2:
Under the Search Datasets bar, enter `fastai_offline` and fastai_offline should come up as an option.  Click on the `Add` tab

![fastoff.PNG](attachment:fastoff.PNG)
source.609312bd: Check that all the dependancies loaded ok
source.dfedeed5:
Some competitions require that the `internet` be turned `off` such as:

- [Prostate cancer diagnosis using the Gleason grading system](https://www.kaggle.com/c/prostate-cancer-grade-assessment)
- [OSIC Pulmonary Fibrosis Progression](https://www.kaggle.com/c/osic-pulmonary-fibrosis-progression)


This dataset allows you to easily load `fastai`(current latest version 2.0.13) dependencies with the internet tab set to `off`
